caption.p: A) Changes in total volatile basic nitrogen (TVB-N) of rainbow trout Ô¨Ållets during refrigerated storage; B) Peroxide value (meq kg -1 sample) of trout fillets during refrigerated storage ; C) Changes in free fatty acids (FFA) values of fish samples during refrigerated storage. C: Without coating and vacuum control; CV: Without coating and vacuumed control; ZV: Zein coating with vacuum; ZEX: Zein coating with 2.00% extract and vacuumed; ZEO: Zein coating with 1.00% essential oil (EO) and vacuumed; ZEXO: Zein coating with 1.00% EO and 1.00% extract and vacuumed
